mean_cn: n. 让步，特许，特许权，承认
mean_en: the act of giving up something or doing something in order to reach agreement
word_etyma: conces让步 + sion名词后缀 → concession 让步，妥协
short_phrase: make some concessions with each other
sentence: The mother made a concession and allowed the boy to continue watching TV.
sentence_trans: 妈妈让步了，同意让小男孩再多看一会儿电视。
